name: Hostal Abrevadero

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2007, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The hostal is very close to the underground. The building is very old and room we had was very small and not so comfortable, there was neither a table, nor nightstands nor a closet! It was even quite cold. You can have double beds.
reviews.title: ok, but...

reviews.text: The only 2 positive things I can say about this hotel are it is quiet and there was air conditioning (although it only went on after 8:30pm and shut off sometime during the night.). It is a monastic room, at best, with a camp-like bed. The shower leaked so badly, we had to toss our towels on the bathroom floor to soak up the water, lest we fall. The bathroom door did not close. One had to take a chair in to prop against the door for privacy. We had to ask for soap, but towels were provided. Mold was growing on the walls of the room. There is no phone, and the desk people were not particularly friendly. It is not 5 minutes from the La Rambla as they claim, (perhaps 15) and the neighborhood is a little seedy. One more positive, although it was clean, I would never return.
reviews.title: Don't go there!

reviews.text: Man on desk was not helpful, was full of himself and he felt it necessary tell us we where ignorant english people because we couldn't speak good spanish, and that he could speak five languages. We tried our best speak their language but after that point we just didn't communicate. Yes and we are scottish, know who is ignorant.
reviews.title: Rude

likes.liked: — don't go! its a building site

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed November 2006, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: I have literally just returned form this place and can only state what a foul and dirty place it is. We stayed in room 403 - the walls are covered in dirty woodchip, the floor is bumpy tile, the shower fixture was broken so that the head would not stay on the wall, the shower tray was cracked and there is no sound proofing. No plugs for the sinks.
reviews.title: Foul, rude, filthy hovel

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2006, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Only advantage is the fabulous location.
reviews.title: Go to the room!!!
Budget at best
reviews.text: The rooms were clean as was the bathroom.

reviews.title: Dirty, disgusting
reviews.text: The floors had mostly cracked tiles, the bathroom had a shower with no wall attachment. Walls had various paint and touch up jobs done over time in different colours with some paint pealing.
Some rooms are much better than others, the luck of the draw!
reviews.title: Disgusting, Loud...

reviews.text: One of the worst hostal I have ever stayed in.
reviews.title: Dirty

description: Our hostel is a simple and comfortable place, ideal for those who want to experience the heart of the city from a quiet setting. Hostal Abrevadero has all the comforts for you to feel right at home. Our philosophy is to offer the guest a good level of comfort with friendly service. We like to give our visitors personalized service, offering them everything they need, from 24-hour reception to ticket reservations for events.
